Title: Authorizes the reissuance of certain benefits in instances of fraud or theft of benefits
Summary: Authorizes the reissuance of emergency assistance to needy families with children, safety net assistance, SNAP benefits, or emergency assistance for aged, blind and disabled persons in instances of fraud or theft of benefits.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to reissuing certain benefits in instances of fraud or theft of such benefits
